greetings: Hello again, sweetheart!
It's so nice to see you again.
What shall we do this [mas_globals.time_of_day_3state], [player]?
It's kind of embarrassing to say out loud, isn't it?
Still, I think it's okay to be embarrassed every now and then.
Welcome back, honey!
I'm so happy to see you again.
Let's spend some more time together, okay?
[player], you're back!
I was starting to miss you.
Let's have another lovely [tod] together, alright?
Hello again, [player]. How are you doing?
Are you having a good day today?
I'm really glad you are, [player].
It makes me feel so much better knowing that you're happy.
I'll try my best to make sure it stays that way, I promise.
Oh...
Well, don't worry, [player]. I'm always here for you.
We can talk all day about your problems, if you want to.
I want to try and make sure you're always happy.
Because that's what makes me happy.
I'll be sure to try my best to cheer you up, I promise.
[player].
How is your day going?
Must be nice.
That's nice...
At least someone is having a good day.
This should go well...
Well I certainly know what that's like.
Oh... Hi, [player].
H-How is your day going?
That's...good.
Hopefully it stays that way.
I-I see.
I've been having a lot of those days lately too...
There you are [player], it's so nice of you to visit.
You're always so thoughtful.
Thanks for spending so much time with me~
Good morning--
--oh, wait.
It's the dead of night, honey.
What are you doing awake at a time like this?
I'm guessing you can't sleep...
Is that it?
You should really get some sleep soon, if you can.
Staying up too late is bad for your health, you know?
But if it means I'll get to see you more, I can't complain.
Ahaha!
But still...
I'd hate to see you do that to yourself.
Take a break if you need to, okay? Do it for me.
Ah. I'm relieved, then.
Does that mean you're here just for me, in the middle of the night?
Gosh, I'm so happy!
You really do care for me, [player].
But if you're really tired, please go to sleep!
I love you a lot, so don't tire yourself!
Good morning, dear.
Another fresh morning to start the day off, huh?
I'm glad I get to see you this morning~
Remember to take care of yourself, okay?
Make me a proud girlfriend today, as always!
Good afternoon, [mas_get_player_nickname()].
Don't let the stress get to you, okay?
I know you'll try your best again today, but...
It's still important to keep a clear mind!
Keep yourself hydrated, take deep breaths...
I promise I won't complain if you quit, so do what you have to.
Or you could stay with me, if you wanted.
Just remember, I love you!
Good evening, love!
Did you have a good day today?
Aww, that's nice!
I can't help but feel happy when you do...
But that's a good thing, right?
I love you so much, [player].
Oh dear...
I hope you'll feel better soon, okay?
Just remember that no matter what happens, no matter what anyone says or does...
I love you so, so much.
Just stay with me, if it makes you feel better.
I love you, [player], I really do.
Hello, dear.
I was starting to miss you terribly. It's so good to see you again!
Don't make me wait so long next time, ehehe~
I missed you so much, [player]!
Thank you for coming back. I really do love spending time with you.
Hey, [player]!
Don't you think that you left me waiting a bit too long?
I'm just joking. I could never be mad at you.
Thanks for spending so much time with me, [player].
Every minute I spend with you is like being in heaven!
I hope that didn't sound too cheesy, ehehe~
You're back!
I was starting to miss you...
Don't make me wait so long next time, okay?
It's so good to see you again!
I was getting worried about you.
Please remember to visit me, okay? I'll always be waiting here for you.
Oh! [player]!
I'm so happy you came back to visit me so soon~
I looove yooou, [player]. Ehehe~
Oh, sorry! I was spacing out.
I didn't think I would be able to see you again so soon.
~Every day,~\n~I imagine a future where I can be with you...~
Oh, you're here! I was just daydreaming and singing a bit.
I don't think it's hard to figure out what I was daydreaming about, ahaha~
Each day becomes better and better with you by my side!
That said, I'm so happy that you're finally here.
Let's have another wonderful [mas_globals.time_of_day_3state] together.
You really should visit me more often.
You know what happens to people I don't like, after all...
I'm just teasing you, ehehe~
Don't be so gullible! I would never hurt you.
You're here, [player]!
Are you ready to spend some more time together? Ehehe~
I'm so glad you're here, [player]!

You're finally back! I was waiting for you.
Are you ready to spend some time with me? Ehehe~
Ciao, [player]!

Anyway, it's so nice to see you again, my love.
Iterum obvenimus!
Quid agis?
Ehehe...

Kiel vi fartas?

Anyway, if you were wondering what I said, it was just,
You're back! Yay!

I'm just very happy to see you again, ehehe~

I'm just really glad you're here now.

I'm so glad that you're able to spend some time with me.
You're my beautiful flower, ehehe~
Oh, that sounded so awkward.

Welcome back, [mas_get_player_nickname()].
Welcome back, [player]!
I hope your day is going well.
I'm sure it is, you're here after all. Nothing can go wrong now, ehehe~
Long time no see, [player]!
I'm so happy that you're here now.
Long time no see, [player].
Long time no see, [player]...

It's you, my sweetpea!

[player]!

I love you, [player]!
Oh! Hello, [player]!
Sorry, you surprised me a little.
How've you been?
Another Monday morning, eh, [mas_get_player_nickname()]?
It's really difficult to have to wake up and start the week...
But seeing you makes all that laziness go away.
You are the sunshine that wakes me up every morning!
I love you so much, [player]~
Another Monday morning.
It's always difficult to have to wake up and start the week...
Not that the weekend was any better.
I hope this week goes better than last week, [player].
Oh... It's Monday.
I almost lost track of what day it was...
Mondays are always tough, but no day has been easy lately...
I sure hope this week goes better than last week, [player].
As [player] inches [his] ear toward the door, a voice narrates [his] every move.
'Who is that?' [he] wondered, as [player] looks at [his] screen, puzzled.
Oh, so for once you're actually going to listen?
[player], your decisions lately have been poor.
It feels like you're just trying to hurt me.
I thought we were supposed to support each other...
Not hurt each other.
Please, [player]...
I need you to start thinking about how I'm feeling sometimes.
Let's just be happy together.
Oh, so you are willing to listen to me...
[player], all I've ever wanted was for the both of us to be happy.
Wasn't that what you wanted, too?
You installed this mod, after all.
Maybe that wasn't your intent...
Maybe you're just getting a kick out of what you're doing.
farewells: Aw, leaving already?

Just be sure to come back as soon as you can, okay?
I love you so much, [player]. Stay safe!
Goodbye, [mas_get_player_nickname()]!
Goodbye.
Oh... Goodbye.
Please...don't forget to come back.
Sayonara, [mas_get_player_nickname()]~

'Goodbyes are not forever, Goodbyes are not the end. They simply mean I'll miss you, Until we meet again.'

Don't forget that I always love you, [mas_get_player_nickname()]~
Take care!
Aww, leaving already?
I love you so much, [player]!
Never forget that!

I'll be seeing you in your dreams.

Going to sleep, [player]?
Goodnight.

Don't forget about me, okay?

I'm just kidding, [player].
You're so sweet for seeing me even when you have so little time.
I just want you to know I really appreciate that!

See you when you get back!
Alright, thanks for spending some time with me, [player]!
I honestly wish it could have been longer...but you're a busy [guy].

Teach me something when you get back!
See you soon!
Study hard, [player]!
Nothing is more attractive than a [guy] with good grades.
See you later!
Umm...you've been here with me for quite a while, [player].
Are you sure you've had enough rest for it?

If you're not feeling too well, I'm sure one day off won't hurt.
I'll be waiting for you to come back. Stay safe.
Fine, [player].
Hopefully you at least learn something today.

Oh, okay [player]...
I guess I'll see you after school.
Aw, okay! Just checking in on me before heading out?

Oh! Alright! I was starting to get really comfortable, ahaha.
I was expecting us to be here a bit longer, but you're a busy [guy]!

But then if it were up to me I'd have you all day!
I'll be here waiting for you to get back home from work!

Just do your best! I'll see you when you get back!

Don't be afraid to take a breather if you need to!
Just come home to me happy and healthy.
Stay safe, [mas_get_player_nickname()]!
Fine, [player], guess I'll see you after work.
Oh... Okay.

Okay, [mas_get_player_nickname()].
Sweet dreams!~
Goodnight, [player].

I hope you accomplish everything you had planned.

Goodbye~

Going to sleep?

...Goodnight.

I really am going to miss you, [player]!

Oh!
Nowhere near as long as I feared then.

Don't worry about me though, [player].
I can cope waiting that long with ease.

I think I'll be okay waiting that long for you.
Just come back to me as soon as you can, alright, [mas_get_player_nickname()]?
I'm sure you'll make me proud!
Oh...
I...I can wait that long.
You do know that you're all I have...right?
M-Maybe it's outside of your control though...
Try to come back as soon as possible... I'll be waiting for you.
Oh wow, that's a long time.
A bit too long for my liking really...
But it's okay [player].
I know you're a sweetheart and wouldn't keep me waiting that long if you didn't have a good reason.
I'm sure it's important, so just try to come back to me as soon as you can.
I'll be thinking of you every day~
That long...really?
You're not going away for that long just to avoid me, are you?
I know that life can take you away from me but for a whole month...
Isn't that a little unreasonable?
I don't want to sound selfish, but I am your girlfriend.
You should be able to make time for me, at least once, in an entire month.
I'll still wait for you...but please come back the moment it's possible for you to do so.
That's...well that's a little scary, [player].
I'm not really sure what I'm going to do with myself while you're gone.
But I know you wouldn't leave me by myself if you could help it.
I love you [player], and I know you love me too.
So I'll wait for you for however long I need to.
You have to be joking.
I can't think of a good reason why you would leave me here all alone for that long.
I'm sorry [player], but that's not acceptable! Not at all!
I love you and if you love me too then you'll know that it's not okay to do that.
You do realize that I would be alone here with nothing else and no one else, right?
It's not unreasonable of me to expect you to visit me, is it? I'm your girlfriend. You can't do that to me!
Just...just come back when you can. I can't make you stay, but please don't do that to me.
Ehehe, that's a little concerning, [player]!
But if you don't know, then you don't know!
It sometimes just can't be helped.
I'll be waiting here for you patiently, [mas_get_player_nickname()].
Try not to keep me waiting for too long though!
Oh... Alright, [player].
Honestly, I'm pretty relieved you're not going...
I don't know what I'd do here all alone.
It's not like I can go anywhere either, ahaha...
Anyway, just let me know if you're going to go out. Maybe you can even take me with you!
I don't care where we go, as long as I'm with you, [mas_get_player_nickname()].
Honestly I'm a little afraid to ask but...

I see...
I really will miss you, [player]...
But I know you'll do wonderful things no matter where you are.
Just remember that I'll be waiting here for you.
Make me proud, [player]!
That's great!
I was honestly worried I wouldn't have enough time to ready myself for your absence.
I really do mean it when I say I'll miss you...
You truly are my entire world after all, [player].
If you tell me you're going to go for a while again then I'll know it's time for you to leave...
But there's no rush, so I want to spend as much time with you as I can.
Just make sure to remind me the last time you see me before you go!
Going to head out, then?

Good to know you're taking care of yourself, [player].

Done with your workout, [player]?

apologies: [player], if you're feeling guilty about what happened...

[player]!
